mapper.select: SELECT tr.trans_id, tr.trans_name, tr.trans_description, tr.trans_type, tr.trans_path, tr.trans_repository_id, tr.trans_quartz, tr.trans_record, tr.trans_log_level, tr.trans_status, tr.add_time, tr.add_user, tr.edit_time, tr.edit_user, tr.del_flag, qu.quartz_cron, tm.monitor_success, tm.monitor_fail, (select max(ktr.stop_time) from k_trans_record ktr where ktr.record_trans=tr.trans_id) last_ex_time FROM k_trans AS tr LEFT JOIN k_quartz AS qu ON tr.trans_quartz = qu.quartz_id left join k_trans_monitor tm on tm.monitor_trans=tr.trans_id where tr.add_user=#{addUser} and tr.del_flag=#{delFlag}
